unal.od.jdiffraction.gpu.utils

Class CUDAUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • unal.od.jdiffraction.gpu.utils.CUDAUtils

  • public class CUDAUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    JCuda Utilities class. Some functions were taken from JCuda examples.
    Since:
    JDiffraction 1.2
    Author:
    Pablo Piedrahita-Quintero (jppiedrahitaq@unal.edu.co), Carlos Trujillo (catrujila@unal.edu.co), Jorge Garcia-Sucerquia (jigarcia@unal.edu.co)

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CUDAUtils getInstance()
        Returns the current instance of CUDAUtils. If the current instance is null, a new instance is created.
        Returns:
        instance of CUDAUtils

        Initialize the CUDA driver API.

      • getContext

        public jcuda.driver.CUcontext getContext(jcuda.driver.CUdevice device)
        Returns the context for device. If the current context is null, a new CUcontext is created.
        Parameters:
        device -
        Returns:
        context

      • getMaxThreads

        public int getMaxThreads(jcuda.driver.CUdevice device)
        Returns the maximum number of threads per block for device.
        Parameters:
        device -
        Returns:
        maximum number of threads

      • preparePtxFile

        public static java.lang.String preparePtxFile(java.lang.String cuFileName)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        The extension of the given file name is replaced with "ptx". If the file with the resulting name does not exist, it is compiled from the given file using NVCC. The name of the PTX file is returned.
        Parameters:
        cuFileName - The name of the .CU file
        Returns:
        The name of the PTX file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs
